thread.title: Dining overated
thread.title_full: Dining overated - Review of Trump International Hotel and Tower New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: DL M
title: Dining overated
text: The service in the small dining areas is surely, lacking. We missed our morning meeting after spending an hour waiting for service and then waiting for our meal. We had to go to the front desk to get the room keys replaced multiple times. The shower was not at all what you would expect. Really,... a shower curtain in a a hotel room that costs over $1K per night what a complete disappointment,... one thing I can say is kitchen in the room was awesome, but not one paper towel. View was nice, gym equipment was great.
